get.description:
Get a list of projects for this organization

Returns:
    a list of requested projects

schema.title: Response Get All Projects V0 Projects Get

post.description:
Create a project

Returns:
    the id, name, and tags for the created project

get.description:
Get a project

Returns:
    the requested project

put.description:
Update a project

Returns:
    the requested project

get.description:
Find all scenario sets based on either the project id or the scenario id

Returns:
    a list of scenario sets (project id) or a list of scenarios (scenario id)

parameters.description: The ID of the scenario set

schema.title: Scenario Id
schema.description: The ID of the scenario set

parameters.name: scenario_id

schema.title: Response Get Scenario Sets V0 Scenario Sets Get

post.description:
Triggers a generation of a test scenario set, could be long running.
This scenario set can now be used for testing on a model.

Returns:
    Object: generation result with '201 Created' status code on success.

put.description:
Update a Scenario Set

Returns:
    the updated Scenario Set

parameters.description: The ID of the scenario set to modify

schema.title: Scenario Id
schema.description: The ID of the scenario set to modify

parameters.name: scenario_id

delete.description:
Deletes the scenario set and cascades deletes to all related entities.
Namely, Evaluations, Evaluation Datapoints, and  Model Datapoints

!! Use With Caution !!

Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if scenario_id is not found

Returns: 204 status code on successful deletion

parameters.description: The ID of the Scenario Set to delete

schema.title: Scenario Id
schema.description: The ID of the Scenario Set to delete

parameters.name: scenario_id

parameters.description: Name of the Scenario Set to delete

schema.title: Name
schema.description: Name of the Scenario Set to delete

parameters.name: name

post.description:
Upload new scenarios

Returns:
    the Scenario Set with the uploaded scenarios

get.description:
Get the scenario set for a particular scenario ID

Returns:
    a list of scenarios

parameters.description: The ID of the scenario set

schema.title: Scenario Id
schema.description: The ID of the scenario set

parameters.name: scenario_id

get.description:
Get all scenarios datapoints

Returns:
    a list of scenario datapoints

parameters.description: The ID of the scenario set to download

schema.title: Scenario Id
schema.description: The ID of the scenario set to download

parameters.name: scenario_id

schema.title: Response Get Scenario Set Data Points V0 Scenario Data Points  Scenario Id  Get

post.description:
Triggers a generation of a scenario set based on source scenario ID, could be long running.
A registered model can now use this scenario set for testing.

Returns:
    Object: generation result with '201 Created' status code on success.

Gets all the datapoints for given search criteria.

Returns:
    list: An array of datapoint objects.

schema.title: Response Get Datapoints V0 Find Datapoints Post

post.description:
Expects a date range and returns a summary of datapoint counts by day and feedback range.

Returns:
    list: An array of datapoint objects.

schema.title: Response Get Datapoints Summary V0 Summary Datapoints Post

post.description:
Add a datapoint for a particular registered model

Returns:
    Empty ressponse with 201 status code on success.

Register a model for testing. This model can then be tested using a scenario set.

Returns:
    the id of the registered model

get.description:
Get a model under test

Returns:
    the requested model under test

put.description:
Update a model under test

Returns:
    the updated model under test

parameters.description: The ID of the model under test

schema.title: Mut Id
schema.description: The ID of the model under test

parameters.name: mut_id

get.description:
Get a list of models under test for this organization

Returns:
    a list of requested models under test

schema.title: Response Get All Models Under Test V0 Models Under Test Get

post.description:
Find Test Runs

Returns:
    a list of Test Runs

schema.title: Response Find Test Run V0 Find Test Runs Post

get.description:
Get a Test Run

Returns:
    the Test Run

put.description:
Update a Test Run
Returns:
    the updated Test Run

parameters.description: The ID of the test run to modify

schema.title: Test Run Id
schema.description: The ID of the test run to modify

parameters.name: test_run_id

post.description:
Runs tests on a model (mut_id) using previously generated scenario.
Feeds the scenario data (scenario_id) into the model and evaulates results
depending on the test type specified.

Returns:
    The test run data which includes the evaluated metrics from the run.

Add a test run metric

Returns:
    The persisted test run metric item

get.description:
Get a Test Run

Returns:
    the Test Run

parameters.description: The ID of the test data point to return

schema.title: Test Data Point Id
schema.description: The ID of the test data point to return

parameters.name: test_data_point_id

Find Test Data Point

Returns:
    a list of Test Data Points

schema.title: Response Find Test Data Points V0 Find Test Data Points Post

post.description:
Generate code for an evaluator for testing.

    the evaluator object

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: Project ID or None for default project

result.title: Result
result.description: Outputted value from the model based on the input

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags are strings that can be used to filter datapoints in the Okareo app

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: Feedback is a 0 to 1 float value that captures user feedback range for related datapoint results

context_token.title: Context Token
context_token.description: Context token is a unique token to link various datapoints which originate from the same context

context_token.description: Context token is a unique token to link various datapoints which originate from the same context

date.title: Date

feedback_ranges.title: Feedback Ranges
feedback_ranges.description: List of feedback range summaries for the date.

tags.description: Tags are strings that can be used to filter projects in the Okareo app

seed_data.title: Seed Data
seed_data.description: Seed data is a list of dictionaries, each with an input and result

generation_type.description:
Type of generation. Current supported scenario types are:
Seed: Seed data for a scenario set
Rephrase invariant: Results will be rephrased versions of inputs
Conditional: Results will be rephrased inputs represented in a conditional format
Text reverse question: The result will be the target question for the input
Text reverse label: The result will be the intent of the target question for the input

generation_tone.description: Tone to use for scenario generation.

source_scenario_id.title: Source Scenario Id
source_scenario_id.description: ID for the scenario set that the generated scenario set will use as a source

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the generated scenario set

number_examples.title: Number Examples
number_examples.description: Number of examples to be generated for the scenario set

Type of generation. Current supported scenario types are:
Seed: Seed data for a scenario set
Rephrase invariant: Results will be rephrased versions of inputs
Conditional: Results will be rephrased inputs represented in a conditional format
Text reverse question: The result will be the target question for the input
Text reverse label: The result will be the intent of the target question for the input
